html.p: Enables you to open any query in the Pivot interface, without requiring the creation of a data model. This means that you have the flexibility to choose what interface to explore your data.
Additionally, this enables admins with another method to construct data models, starting with search

ul.li: Ephemeral data model is created that collects user specified fields within Pivot as a single, flat object
User can save their Pivot (additionally prompts user to save data model)
